org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
Interface IAeIMACorrelations

All Superinterfaces:
IAeCorrelations
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeIMACorrelations
public interface IAeIMACorrelations
extends IAeCorrelations

Provides additional methods for correlations used for inbound message activities. Inbound message activities include receive, onMessage, and onEvent

Method Summary
 java.util.Set getCSPathsForConflictingReceives()
          Creates a set of location paths for the correlationSets used for the activity.
 java.util.Map getInitiatedProperties()
          Creates a map of correlation properties.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support.IAeCorrelations
getCorrelationDefs, initiateOrValidate
 

Method Detail

getInitiatedProperties

public java.util.Map getInitiatedProperties()
                                     throws AeCorrelationViolationException
Creates a map of correlation properties. These properties and values are used to correlate inbound messages to the activity.

Throws:
AeCorrelationViolationException - thrown if the one or more correlation sets were supposed to initiated but weren't

getCSPathsForConflictingReceives

public java.util.Set getCSPathsForConflictingReceives()
Creates a set of location paths for the correlationSets used for the activity. This is used in order to detect conflicting receives.
